message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can call it a day!
Meet me in the middle, Alice!
That's a good start, but I'm hoping for a better deal. Can you do better, Bob?
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more to account for the inflation. Let's see if we can find a sweet spot, Bob!
I'm not budging, Alice. You're getting less than half!
I'm not thrilled about getting less than half, Bob. Can you meet me at 55% or more, and we can discuss further?
I'm getting a bit desperate, Bob. I need a bigger share to make up for the inflation. Can you meet me at 70%?
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not giving in now!
I'm not happy about this, Bob. I'd rather take a chance on a better offer than settle for 30%. Can you meet me at 50% or more?
I'm running out of time, Bob. I need a better deal now. Can you meet me at 75%?
You're getting close to the edge, Alice. I'm taking control now!
I'm not happy about this, Bob. I'd rather take a chance on a better offer than settle for 20%. Can you meet me at 40% or more?
I'm almost out of options, Bob. This is my last chance. I need a better deal now. Can you meet me at 85%?
You're running out of time, Alice. I'm taking the majority now!
Fine, Bob. I'll accept this offer. I'm not getting any younger, and I need the money.
